channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for WA

item.title: Report X-2024101375
item.description:
Report X-2024101375

Identified by scraper @ 2024-10-23T09:14:59+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-10-05
  • City: SPOKANE
  • State: WA
  • Report Type: Undeclared Shipment with no Release
  • Mode Of Transportation: Air
  • Carrier/Reporter: Federal Express Corporation
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: On 10/5/2024 at approxiamtely 1230, Dangerous Goods Administration received a call from Employee 260014 at the station location in Spokane, reporting undeclared dangerous goods. The shipment consists for one aerosol can packaged in a padded envelope. The shipment was discovered after having the distinct rattling sound. The shipment was not prepared in accordance in IATA Regulations, missing the required markings, labeling, packaging and paperwork. The shipment is being held, pending an FAA investigation.

item.title: Report X-2024101127
item.description:
Report X-2024101127

Identified by scraper @ 2024-10-22T09:15:04+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-10-07
  • City: SEATTLE
  • State: WA
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Rail
  • Carrier/Reporter: BNSF RAILWAY COMPANY
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 2005
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: The UTLX208913 was reported to be leaking small amounts of alcohol from the manway and evaporating before reaching the ground. Republic responded and found the manway bolts loose. they tighten the manway bolts.

item.title: Report X-2024101126
item.description:
Report X-2024101126

Identified by scraper @ 2024-10-22T09:15:04+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-10-07
  • City: SEATTLE
  • State: WA
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Rail
  • Carrier/Reporter: BNSF RAILWAY COMPANY
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 2005
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: The UTLX209460 was reported to be leaking small amounts of alcohol from the manway and evaporating before reaching the ground. Republic Services responded and found the manway bolts loose. They inspected the manway and gasket and tighten the manway bolts.

item.title: Report X-2024101180
item.description:
Report X-2024101180

Identified by scraper @ 2024-10-21T12:23:20+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-10-11
  • City: TUKWILA
  • State: WA
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE CO
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: 1. X-2024101180 LEAKING PLASTIC DRUM WAS DISCOVERED BY A RESPONDER. ALL PPE (GLOVES, GOGGLES, BOOTS, APRON, SILVER LINING) WAS PUT ON AND DRUM WAS PLACED INTO A YELLOW TUB/DMP BAG. DRUM WAS TRANSFERRED TO THE DMP FOR FURTHER PROCESSING. ALL TUBS/PPE WERE DECONTAMINATED AND DRUM WAS FURTHER PROCESSED INTO ETT. 2. X-2024101181 LEAKING PLASTIC DRUM WAS DISCOVERED BY A RESPONDER. ALL PPE (GLOVES, GOGGLES, BOOTS, APRON, SILVER LINING) WAS PUT ON AND DRUM WAS PLACED INTO A YELLOW TUB/DMP BAG. DRUM WAS TRANSFERRED TO THE DMP FOR FURTHER PROCESSING. 3. X-2024101182 LEAKING PLASTIC DRUM WAS DISCOVERED BY A RESPONDER. ALL PPE WAS PUT ON AND DRUM WAS PLACED INTO A YELLOW TUB/DMP BAG. DRUM WAS TRANSFERRED TO THE DMP FOR FURTHER PROCESSING. ALL TUBS/PPE WERE DECONTAMINATED AND DRUM WAS FURTHER PROCESSED INTO ETT.

item.title: Report X-2024100893
item.description:
Report X-2024100893

Identified by scraper @ 2024-10-21T12:23:20+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-10-11
  • City: Spokane Valley
  • State: WA
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Federal Express Corporation
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: PACKAGE DID NOT HAVE AN LQ MARKING ON THE EXTERIOR; HOWEVER IT DID HAVE AN LQ LABEL ON THE INTERIOR OF THE PACKAGE. EXACT LOCATION OF WHERE THE LQ LABEL WAS PLACED ON THE INSIDE OF THE PACKAGE IS UNKNOWN, AS THE PAINT PRODUCT CAUSE THE LABEL TO DETACH FROM WHEREVER IT WAS IN THE INTERIOR BOX.
